entry.title: 從零推導導數公式
entry.content:
從零推導導數公式

証明目標

1.等價無窮小:

當x→0x \to 0x→0時

sinx∼xsinx \sim xsinx∼xtanx∼xtanx \sim xtanx∼x
ln(x+1)∼xln(x+1) \sim xln(x+1)∼xex−1∼xe^x-1 \sim xex−1∼x
arcsinx∼xarcsinx \sim xarcsinx∼xarctanx∼xarctanx \sim xarctanx∼x
loga(1+x)∼xln⁡alog_{a}{(1+x)} \sim \frac{x}{\ln_{}{a} }loga​(1+x)∼ln​ax​x−ln⁡(1+x)∼12x2x-\ln (1+x) \sim \frac{1}{2} x^{2}x−ln(1+x)∼21​x2
1− cosx∼12x21-\ cosx \sim \frac{1}{2} x^21− cosx∼21​x2ln(x+1+x2)∼xln(x+\sqrt{1+x^2} ) \sim xln(x+1+x2​)∼x
x−sinx∼16x3x-sinx \sim \frac{1}{6}x^3x−sinx∼61​x3tanx−x∼16x3tanx-x \sim \frac{1}{6}x^3tanx−x∼61​x3
(1+x)a−1∼ax(1+x)^a-1 \sim ax(1+x)a−1∼axarcsinx−x∼16x3arcsinx-x \sim \frac{1}{6}x^3arcsinx−x∼61​x3
x−arctanx∼13x3x-arctanx \sim \frac{1}{3}x^3x−arctanx∼31​x3tanx−sinx∼12x3tanx-sinx \sim \frac{1}{2}x^3tanx−sinx∼21​x3

2.導數公式:

(C)′=0{(C)}'=0(C)′=0(xn)′=nxn−1{(x^n)}'=nx^{n-1}(xn)′=nxn−1
(sinx)′=cosx{(sinx)}'=cosx(sinx)′=cosx(cosx)′=−sinx{(cosx)}'=-sinx(cosx)′=−sinx
(tanx)′=sec2x{(tanx)}'=sec^2x(tanx)′=sec2x(cotx)′=−csc2x{(cotx)}'=-csc^2x(cotx)′=−csc2x
(secx)′=secxtanx{(secx)}'=secxtanx(secx)′=secxtanx(cscx)′=−cscxcotx{(cscx)}'=-cscxcotx(cscx)′=−cscxcotx
(ax)′=axlna (a>0,a≠1){(a^x)}'=a^xlna\ (a>0,a \neq 1)(ax)′=axlna (a>0,a=1)(ex)′=ex{(e^x)}'=e^x(ex)′=ex
(log⁡ax)′=1xlna (a>0,a≠1){\left(\log _{a} x\right)}'=\frac{1}{xlna}\ (a>0,a \neq 1)(loga​x)′=xlna1​ (a>0,a=1)(lnx)′=1x{(lnx)}'=\frac{1}{x}(lnx)′=x1​
(arcsinx)′=11−x2{(arcsinx)}'=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}(arcsinx)′=1−x2​1​(arccosx)′=−11−x2{(arccosx)}'=-\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}(arccosx)′=−1−x2​1​
(arctanx)′=11+x2{(arctanx)}'=\frac{1}{1+x^2}(arctanx)′=1+x21​(arccotx)′=−11+x2{(arccotx)}'=-\frac{1}{1+x^2}(arccotx)′=−1+x21​

証明

1.等價無窮小

sinx∼xsinx \sim xsinx∼x

即証lim⁡x→ 0xsinx=1\lim\limits_{x\to\ 0}\frac{x}{sinx}=1x→ 0lim​sinxx​=1
